item.title: Get collection schema
item.description: Get collection schema # Returns schema information about one or more collections. Examples # The following request gets the schema information of all the collections under the default namespace: GET /default:*/_schema Retrieve the schema information of all the collections: GET /_schema Request # GET /<target>/_schema Path Parameters # target (Optional, String) Comma-separated, names of the collections to get (wildcard supported)
